A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Enjoyable and fun\, but Disney's fingerprints are visible all over this story.  As a movie it is enjoyable\, but as a Star Wars movie it left me with no desire to see what happens next.  I don't plan on seeing Episode 9 in theaters.  I did enjoy myself as I watched it\, I loved the Military Industrial Complex commentary and a lot of things were done very well\, its just not a very good Star Wars movie.  I think the critic score vs the audience score is very telling.
